item.title: How a service mesh architecture can help you clean up those skeletons in your closet.

item.description: Roger V. Beathard is an ICT veteran with a passion for open source. He has a solid experience in the telecommunication and information technology industry for more than 17 years. Throughout his career, he has built a number of large-scale, cross-country OSS/BSS platforms/systems and operation tools, most of them are still running in productions. He loves open source and has been contributing to a variety of open source projects, including
